text: == Events == * Pope Innocent I succeeds Pope Anastasius I. * The Vandals start their westward trek from Dacia and Hungary (or 400). *The Visigoths begin to attack the northernmost reaches of Italy, causing destruction in the countryside. *Kumarajiva arrives in Changan. *Western Roman Empire general Stilicho leads an extensive campaign against the Vandals in Rhaetia. *Synod of Turin
